snippet: Officials charged Lavrentis Lavrentiadis with embezzling from a bank he helped oversee to help prop up his flailing businesses.
abstract: Greek authorities arrest high-profile oligarch Lavrentis Lavrentiadis and charge him with embezzling from bank he helped oversee as well as fraud, money laundering and membership in criminal gang; arrest coincides with release of $45 billion portion of aid from Greece’s European creditors, who have pressed Athens to clean up corruption that has been root of the country’s problems.

byline.contributor: Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting from Athens.

lead_paragraph: Officials charged Lavrentis Lavrentiadis with embezzling from a bank he helped oversee to help prop up his flailing businesses.

headline.seo: Greek Oligarch Arrested in Fraud Inquiry
headline.main: Greek Oligarch Is Arrested in Fraud Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Greek Oligarch Is Arrested in Fraud Inquiry
